Name: Raul Daniel
description:
Raul Daniel is from the city of Encarnaci√≥n. He works in hydroponics, he has all the infrastructure and a steady clientele.
Thanks to this work he has been able to get ahead, maintain his home and pay for any unforeseen expenses.
He is an enterprising person who started with very little, but who has grown and improved thanks to his effort and daily sacrifice.
He requests this loan to be able to make improvements in his greenhouse, and with this he can continue with his work as he has been doing.
